title: Big Ten fines Michigan, Ohio St. $100K for melee
description: The Big Ten fined Michigan and Ohio State $100,000 each for their football programs' roles in the postgame melee but the league doesn't plan on suspending any players.
author: Mark Schlabach

title: Tomlin calls on Pickens to 'grow up' after flags
description: Steelers wide receiver George Pickens drew the ire of coach Mike Tomlin for drawing two unsportsmanlike conduct flags in Sunday's 44-38 win against the Bengals.
author: Brooke Pryor

title: How Liverpool mixed best of Klopp & Slot to beat Man City
description: Liverpool's perfect mix and match of Jurgen Klopp's heavy metal and Arne Slot's symphony destroyed Manchester City, writes Phil McNulty.

title: Trump beats Hawkins to win second UK Championship crown
description: Judd Trump claims his second UK Championship title with a hard-fought 10-8 victory over Barry Hawkins at the Barbican in York.

title: Can Liverpool be caught? Neville assesses Arsenal, Chelsea, Man City hopes
description: Gary Neville says Liverpool are now "strong favourites" to win this season's Premier League title after a 2-0 win in Sunday's showdown with champions Manchester City, who he believes must now undergo a rebuild under Pep Guardiola.

title: Carra: Man City face a fight to finish in the top four
description: Jamie Carragher said Manchester City are facing a battle to finish in the top four after their 2-0 loss to Liverpool on Sunday left them 11 points behind the Premier League leaders in fifth.

title: Live updates: 49ers fighting for their playoff lives vs. surging Bills
description: San Francisco is clinging to slim postseason hopes in another tough, cold road environment, while Buffalo has won six straight and is eyeing the AFC's top seed.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Magic get 12th win in past 13 games, NBA Cup clash with Knicks up next
description: The Magic are red-hot going into Tuesday's NBA Cup clash with the Knicks to win East Group A.
author: Yahoo Sports
